definition: to face a thousand pointing fingers with a cool scowl (citation from Lu Xun)/to treat with disdain/to defy
pinyin: heng2 mei2 leng3 dui4 qian1 fu1 zhi3

definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
